title: Energy Secretary Rick Perry to step down in November: report
text: U.S. Energy Secretary Rick Perry is expected to announce his resignation by the end of November, Politico reported late Thursday. While Perry's trips to Ukraine have been mentioned in the impeachment inquiry into President Donald Trump, his departure is unrelated and has been planned for months, Politico said, citing multiple sources familiar with his plans. The report said Deputy Energy Secretary Dan Brouillette is expected to replace him. Perry's spokeswoman told a Dallas reporter that Perry "is still the Secretary of Energy & a proud member of President Trump's Cabinet. One day the media will be right. Today is not that day," though she did not explicitly deny the report.
